dragdrop.layoutStyles:
<style type="text/css">		
#q2_target_container0 {  
    margin: auto;
    position:relative; <!-- This is important-->
    width: 680px;  
    height: 300px;
   
}	
	.tbody .th {
    text-align: center;
}		
			.target {  
			  border: 2px;
			  border-style: dashed;
			  border-color: #999999; 
			  display: inline-block; 
			  position: absolute; 
			  min-width: 200px;  
			  width: 250px;  
			  min-height: 40px; 
			  height: 40px;
			  
			}
			
			
			.initiator
			{
				display: inline-block;
				min-height: 20px;
				min-width: 60px;
				background: #ffc;
				text-align: center;
				padding: 4px;
				cursor: move;
				border-style: solid;
    			border-width: 1px;
    			border-color: black;
			}
			
			.dragdropspacer
			{
				height: 50px;
			}
			
		</style>
dragdrop.targetArea:
